heading: HB00078
0: AN ACT INSTITUTING THE MAGNA CARTA OF FILIPINO SEAFARERS
mother-bill statusstatus: Approved by the House on 2017-07-26, transmitted to the Senate on 2017-07-31 and received by the Senate on 2017-07-31 Substituted by HB05685
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00078
FULL TITLE : AN ACT INSTITUTING THE MAGNA CARTA OF FILIPINO SEAFARERS
SHORT TITLE : Magna Carta Of Filipino Seafarers
ABSTRACT : Seeks to recognize and uphold and uphold the rights of Filipino seafarers, institute mechanisms for the enforcement and protection thereof, and provide for compulsory benefits to alleviate their condition in life.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : AGLIPAY-VILLAR, EMMELINE
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Welfare
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :

3. Savellano (045 2016-11-16)4. Batocabe (083 2017-03-15)
5. Co (084 2017-05-02)
